item.title: Common problems in Theoretical CS
item.description: This note is useful to gather in a single place the description of some common problems in CS and their theoretical implications explained in other notes. The Clique problem Description of the problem This problem is in NP, find all sub-graphs where all nodes are connected (this set of nodes forms a complete graph). We can prove that the problem is in NP because there is an easy non-deterministic algorithm that computes it.
